story.text: NEW YORK Jan 3 The New York Mercantile Exchange, Inc. said on Wednesday that its financially settled soft commodity futures contracts will begin trading on the CME Globex electronic trading platform on Jan. 7 for trade dated Jan. 8. Soft commodities futures include NYMEX cocoa, NYMEX coffee, NYMEX cotton, NYMEX FCOJ (frozen concentrated orange juice), NYMEX sugar No. 11, and NYMEX sugar No. 14. These contracts will continue to clear and trade on NYMEX ClearPort. As previously announced, NYMEX will waive trading, transaction, and clearing fees, through June 2007.
story.title: nymex softs trading on globex to start jan . 7
